oQ2VAw.en:
[Nella]
Kids, it is time to go home.
You should go home early. Come here after you grow up.
oQ2VAw.pt:
[Nella]
Kids, it is time to go home.
You should go home early. Come here after you grow up.

ow2VAw.en:
[Nella]
I cannot let you go without anything.
Can I gave you a present?
It is not free, though.
ow2VAw.pt:
[Nella]
I cannot let you go without anything.
Can I gave you a present?
It is not free, though.

pA2VAw.en:
[Nella]
I want to see what you can do?

bring me what I want?
pA2VAw.pt:
[Nella]
I want to see what you can do?
If you want to prove that you are growing up well,
bring me what I want?

pQ2VAw.en:
[Nella]
It is simple.
I want ^4D4DFF10 Decayed Nail. 30 Spawns, and 3 Well Baked Cookie^000000.
Can you do that for me?
I am expecting you.
pQ2VAw.pt:
[Nella]
It is simple.
I want ^3131FF10 Decayed Nail. 30 Spawns, and 3 Well Baked Cookie^000000.

pg2VAw.en:
[Nella]
Hey, Adventurer. Haven't you seen my daughter?
I cannot find her.
My husband and I had a quarrel yesterday and she disliked it....
What should I do..
pg2VAw.pt:
[Nella]
Hey, Adventurer. Haven't you seen my daughter?

pw2VAw.pt:

qA2VAw.pt:
[Nella]

[Nella]

Please.
